message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You wanted 50/50, I'll give you 60/40. Take it or leave it!
You're trying to take advantage of me? I'll give you a better deal this time. I'll take 60% and leave you with 40%.
You're not taking advantage of me, I'm taking advantage of you. 70/30, take it or leave it!
You're getting greedy, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal this time. I'll take 45% and leave you with 55%.
You're not getting any better, Alice. 85/15, my final offer. Take it or leave it!
You're really pushing your luck, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal this time. I'll take 52.5% and leave you with 47.5%.
You're getting desperate, Alice. 90/10, my last offer. Take it or leave it!
You're really trying to squeeze me out, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal this time. I'll take 55% and leave you with 45%.
You're running out of options, Alice. 95/5, my final offer. Take it or leave it!
You're really trying to get rid of me, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal this time. I'll take 62.5% and leave you with 37.5%.
Last chance, Alice. 99.9/0.1, take it or leave it. You'll be left with almost nothing if you don't accept!
